meanings.definition: A line that intersects two or more other lines at distinct points.
meanings.sent1: The transversals crossed at the intersection.
meanings.sent2: The transversals cut through the other lines.
meanings.sent3: The transversals decided to meet at the corner for a chat.
meanings.sent4: The transversals were like messengers delivering news to the lines.
meanings.sent5: The transversals created a beautiful pattern where they met.

meanings.definition: A line that intersects a system of parallel lines.
meanings.sent1: The transversals broke the monotony of the parallel lines.
meanings.sent2: The transversals connected the parallel lines at different points.
meanings.sent3: The transversals threw a party for the parallel lines.
meanings.sent4: The transversals were like bridges between the parallel lines.
meanings.sent5: The transversals added an interesting twist to the parallel lines.
